product_name: CliniqueAll About Eyes Rich Eye Cream with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique's All About Eyes Rich Eye Cream is a nourishing eye cream that reduces the look of puffiness and dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesReduces the look of puffiness and undereye circles.Eye area feels soothed with hydration and looks brighter and refreshed.Absorbs easily into skin.Provides the perfect silky-smooth base for foundation or concealer.Dermatologist tested.Ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsThis eye-brightener is packed with powerhouse ingredients, including caffeine, hyaluronic acid, and whey protein.Research ResultsStarts visibly depuffing in 1 day.**Clinical testing on 29 women, after using the product once.Visibly depuffs and reduces the look of dark circles in 4 weeks.****Clinical testing on 32 women, after using the product for 4 weeks.Item 2153462How To UseUse eye cream twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply cream sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Polybutene, Sucrose, Cetyl Esters, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, PEG-100 Stearate, Coleus Barbatus Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Extract, Polysilicone-11, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Stearic Acid, Milk Protein\Lactis Proteinum\Protéine Du Lait, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Protéine Du Petit-Lait, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Squalane, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Cholesterol, Caffeine, PEG-8, Phytosphingosine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Dimethicone, Isomerized Linoleic Acid, Linoleic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2 Hexanediol, Decarboxy Carnosine Hcl, Potassium Sulfate, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use eye cream twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply cream sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.

reviews.headline: Love Clinique products
reviews.comments: Eye cream is wonderful

reviews.headline: I will repurchase this eye cream again
reviews.comments: I have a lot of dryness but this cream has so much hydration. Life saver especially in winter time.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy again
reviews.comments:
I love all about eyes rich 
Very moisturizing 
Excited about this sell
Thank you

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments:
Love the texture of this eye cream.
I have tried many eye creams but never used consistently because of the feel on my face. 
This one is one I actually use daily.

reviews.headline: I love, love, love  this eye cream.
reviews.comments: This is the most effective cream for the eyes. Been using it for years

reviews.headline: Repeat purchase!
reviews.comments: My eyelids are extremely sensitive to most creams. At one point in my life, it was not unusual for me to wake up barely able to see through the puffiness after trying a new eye cream. Thanks to Clinique All About Eyes Rich Eye Cream, this is no longer the case. The cream soothes and softens, all free from puffiness and itching.

reviews.headline: I don't know if I would buy this cream again.
reviews.comments: This cream was recommended by the Ulta salesperson for my request for something to help the bags under my eyes. Although the cream is nice, not greasy, it has done nothing for my bags.

reviews.headline: A Great Choice!
reviews.comments: This is the best eye cream I have ever used.

reviews.headline: Great item.  Use in the morning to start morning routine.
reviews.comments: i love all Clinique items.  I have had many compliments regarding my skin.

reviews.headline: Prefer the Original
reviews.comments: Works well but I prefer the original - the "Rich" formula is fine, does the job, but I didn't find any real benefit over the regular formula.

reviews.headline: Be careful!!
reviews.comments:
Please do your research. This product contains many toxic ingredients and is not allergen friendly! If you have Celiac's, you should not use this product, as if contsins wheat. It contains coal tar dyes!! This is copied from the ingredient list:
Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).  
"What are coal tar dyes? They are a health and environmental hazard. "Coal tar is a mixture of many chemicals, derived from petroleum, Coal tar is recognized as a human carcinogen."

reviews.headline: Bad reaction
reviews.comments: I love the brand. So, I thought I would give it a shot. This eye cream made the skin around my eyes puffy and red. It also made my eyes water. Odd because I have never had this reaction to any of their products before.

reviews.headline: This version is great!
reviews.comments: This version, All About Eyes RICH is great! I'm on my fourth or fifth jar. Be very careful when ordering. The Rich is great, but the version that just says All About Eyes without the "Rich" has Vitamin C in it and it burns a lot! I didn't realize it, just notice the most recent jar was a quite different texture and thought I had gotten a defective jar. The Rich is cream and really works great. The other one burns. Read the description carefully when ordering because the jars and labels look and say the same thing. Only the "Rich" is different.

reviews.headline: Best at night
reviews.comments: Just a tip. I have been using All about Eyes - regular - for several months and am very impressed, so, because my skin is very dry I decided to try this rich formula. This also is excellent but I have found it works best at night only. It doesn't absorb quickly enough to go under concealer.

reviews.headline: New Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I have a skeletal underbite which exacerbates my eye bags and dark circles.  I was given a sample by an employee and I saw immediate results. My under eye area was more plump and eye bags reduced in appearance. I was sold then and there.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing but pore clogging￼
reviews.comments: This works excellent as a moisturizer, however, broke me out repeatedly with visible clogged pores around my eyes, cheeks, and nose. This is even with the two types of chemical exfoliators that I use. I wanted to love it because it was ultra moisturizing and visibly improved the look of fine lines, but I just can't make it work for me. Such a bummer.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye cream for a while and I feel the hydration under my eyes. I use it before putting my makeup and my concealer looks so smooth and not cakey or creases.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments:
I love this eye cream!  It is so soothing and feels so cushiony under my eyes.  I don't know how else to describe it but cushiony.  It is rich and creamy  but at the same time light.  Like magic!
The crepey skin under my
 eyes has tightened and puffiness diminished.  It is so soothing.  I even feel like my hereditary dark circles are improved.

reviews.headline: The best for under makeup!
reviews.comments: I use a different brand of eye cream/gel at night. But my skin is too dry to go without moisturizing on makeup days. This is not too heavy or sticky, even though it says rich cream. Clinique reps have recommended the eye cream in the purple container, but got a deal on this during Ulta's beauty days that was too good to pass up.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: None

media.headline: I would buy this product again

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using All About Eyes since it came out and I can honestly say there is a noticeable effect around my eyes. No sags or weak skin and very little sleep lines. I'm almost 42, but people think I'm in my early 30's thanks to products like this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Does what it says

faceoff_negative.comments: This product may diminishes or "prevents" the look of fine lines over time but it did not work for dark circles at all! I have very very dark circles under my eyes and to tell you the truth I have tried many products over the past years but there's no way to get rid of them, at least for me nothing was helpful. However, the best option is concealing them, so I'd rather invest on a good concealer than treatment.
faceoff_negative.headline: Did not work for me!

rollup.name: All About Eyes Rich Eye Cream with Hyaluronic Acid
